title: Five Kingdoms go to sleep
description: You and your children and grandchildren, alike, will have fun reading together and will cherish the castles and the living things the book describes as the five kingdoms go to sleep, just like the title says. This is a science bedtime story originally written for the author's son. The author, Dr. J. S. Shipman, is readily accessible at DrJ@Learn-Now.org if you have any questions. ( The book is available in English and Greek (Ask Amazon to carry the Greek version,) Soon it will be available in French and Spanish,) Grown-up English language learners, especially those going into medical or allied medical fields, also find the book helpful. The hardcover version of this book with colorful illustrations by fine artist Angel Kourkoulou is available here as soon as it is ready.
author: J.S. Shipman
